modName: Lydia - Regular Save File and Alternate Start Save File
summary: Ever wanted to play as Lydia? Well now you can!
descriptionHtml:
Lydia has decided to take a break from her work at Dragonsreach and has decided to explore the world of Skyrim and start her own adventure.
No quests have been completed, she is experienced in One handed, Block, Heavy Armor, and Archery.  I have been nice enough to not spend the Perk Points she has gained so far, so you can choose Lydia\'s path, play her how you want her to be played.
This is just a save file so in order to install you will only need to extract the files into .../Documents/My Games/Skyrim/Saves  Then launch Skyrim and load the game.  Good luck and have fun!
She may look different in your game as I have lots of skin mods, but she should still look like your Lydia.
Updates:
Added a new save file for those who want to use Alternate Start
author: Chloe Cosgrove
